name: Haos Mountain
description:
Haos Mountain A free falling chaotic decent into Hades!

You have scaled Haos Mountain, created by the Goddess Chaos but her anger is casting you into the pits of hades!

Navigate obstacles, enemies, explosions and more in order to survive! 

If you can drop 10,000 ft into the pit you will appease the goddess!

A fun, arcade style game made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 

Please rate and leave a comment below.  And of course - thanks for playing!
